definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, notably associated with prominent American political figures such as Mitt Romney, the 2012 Republican presidential nominee and former governor of Massachusetts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，尤其与美国著名政治人物相关，如米特·罗姆尼——2012年共和党总统候选人、前马萨诸塞州州长。
definitions.example_en: Mitt Romney ran for president in 2012 and again in 2016, though he did not secure the nomination the second time.
definitions.example_cn: 米特·罗姆尼在2012年竞选总统，并在2016年再次参选，但第二次未能获得提名。
